fields.label: Title Tag
fields.name: toc_title_tag
fields.instructions: HTML tag for the TOC title. Use paragraph or div to avoid including the title in the TOC itself.

fields.label: Heading Levels to Include
fields.name: toc_heading_levels
fields.instructions: Select which heading levels to include in the table of contents.

fields.label: Include ACF Block Headings
fields.name: toc_include_acf_block_headings
fields.instructions: When enabled, headings inside ACF blocks (product boxes, pros/cons, etc.) will be included in the table of contents. Off by default.

fields.label: List Type
fields.name: toc_list_type
fields.instructions: Ordered/unordered lists preserve heading hierarchy. Plain list shows all headings at the same level.

fields.label: Collapsible
fields.name: toc_collapsible
fields.instructions: Allow users to collapse/expand the table of contents.

fields.label: Sticky on Large Screens
fields.name: toc_sticky
fields.instructions: Make the TOC sticky (fixed position) on screens 1400px and wider. Uses CSS position: sticky.

fields.label: Sticky Top Offset
fields.name: toc_sticky_offset
fields.instructions: Distance from the top of the viewport when sticky.

fields.label: Smooth Scroll
fields.name: toc_smooth_scroll
fields.instructions: Enable smooth scrolling when clicking TOC links. Uses native CSS scroll-behavior.

fields.label: Highlight Active Section
fields.name: toc_highlight_active
fields.instructions: Highlight the currently visible section in the TOC using Intersection Observer.

fields.label: Custom CSS Classes
fields.name: toc_custom_class
fields.instructions: Add custom CSS classes to the TOC container. Separate multiple classes with spaces.

fields.label: Title CSS Classes
fields.name: toc_title_class
fields.instructions: Add custom CSS classes to the TOC title element.

fields.label: List CSS Classes
fields.name: toc_list_class
fields.instructions: Add custom CSS classes to the TOC list element.

fields.label: Link CSS Classes
fields.name: toc_link_class
fields.instructions: Add custom CSS classes to TOC link elements.

fields.label: Include Schema Markup
fields.name: toc_schema
fields.instructions: Add JSON-LD schema markup for better SEO. Includes SiteNavigationElement schema.

fields.label: ARIA Label
fields.name: toc_aria_label
fields.instructions: Accessible label for the navigation landmark. Important for screen readers.
